commits.author: Doug Cutting
Doug Cutting
commits.sourceNew:
/** Expert: Low-level search implementation. Finds the top n * hits for query, applying filter if non-null. * *

Called by {@link Hits}. * *

Applications should usually call {@link Searcher#search(Query)} or * {@link Searcher#search(Query,Filter)} instead. */ TopDocs search(Query query, Filter filter, int n) throws IOException;

commits.author: Daniel Naber
commits.sourceNew:
/** Expert: Low-level search implementation. Finds the top n * hits for query, applying filter if non-null. * *

Called by {@link Hits}. * *

Applications should usually call {@link Searcher#search(Query)} or * {@link Searcher#search(Query,Filter)} instead. * @throws BooleanQuery.TooManyClauses */ TopDocs search(Query query, Filter filter, int n) throws IOException;
